Fixed the cubemaps (Thanks Ursus & snowy?)

***IMPORTANT MESSAGE TO SERVER OWNERS***
*This map is meant for 5000 maxvel (everything is still possible with 3.5k)
*This map uses a trigger_once to set HDR settings (and a few other things) so please don't strip them
*Bonus 2 needs autohop near the top of the playerclip tube
*The entirety of bonus 6 is meant to be SCROLL
